verses.name: Ezekiel 40:7
verses.text: And every little chamber was one reed long, and one reed broad; and between the little chambers were five cubits; and the threshold of the gate by the porch of the gate within was one reed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:8
verses.text: He measured also the porch of the gate within, one reed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:9
verses.text: Then measured he the porch of the gate, eight cubits; and the posts thereof, two cubits; and the porch of the gate was inward.
